text: Pangali ulemwa (pa ngajaula kungondo) kwa (ŵandu) ŵangali machili, kapena ŵakulwala, kapena aŵala ŵangaakupata yakuti atole (yakwakamuchisya pa ulendo kapena yakwalechela ŵakusigala pannango), naga achikulupichikaga kwa Allah ni Ntenga Jwakwe ﷺ. Pangali litala lililyose lya (kwagambila) ŵakolosya, soni Allah ni Jwakululuka kusyene, Jwachanasa channope
